metadata.name: BREAKAWAY FROM THE PATTERN
metadata.description:
y parece que no puedo separarme de este patr√≥n

handmade collage artwork
1/1
winning bid also receives the physical collage 

https://twitter.com/stvccs/status/1486764240715206657?s=20&t=tYRJEAucgfHMWuaV1cvJLg

my intentions for this fiery collage was to create an abstract atmosphere decorated with jagged cutouts. I made this piece as reminder to myself that nothing will last forever. this collage was mainly inspired by my current situations with my family, friends, lovers, and peers. I recognize that many of these repeated experiences don't lead to a brighter future for myself and for those involved. as I went I began to project feelings of confusion and frustration through lines, shapes, colors, and imagery.

thank you <3
